alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 11:19PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN QUEENS AND WESTERN NASSAU COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM... At 1118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlantic Beach, or near Long Beach, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Woodmere and Cedarhurst around 1125 PM EDT. Valley Stream, Lynbrook, Oceanside and Baldwin around 1130 PM EDT. Garden City, Hempstead and Elmont around 1135 PM EDT. Mineola, Westbury and Manhasset around 1140 PM EDT. Port Washington, Brookville and Sands Point around 1145 PM EDT. Other locations that could be impacted by this storm include Manorhaven, West Hempstead, Carle Place, Jericho, New Hyde Park, Old Brookville, Upper Brookville, Roslyn Heights, Sea Cliff and Floral Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
